name: panda
title: Panda
desc: A tiny blog theme for astro, Inspired by bearblog.
article:
Astro Panda Blog theme offers a lightweight, simplistic, and highly customizable framework perfect for blogging purposes.


Clone the Astro Panda Blog theme with


git clone https://github.com/yuhangch/astro-theme-panda.git


Key Features


â¢ Stellar performance and lightweight build, boasting an impressive ~30kb size

â¢ Highly optimized and streamlined for an awesome user experience


Customization


You can further personalize the theme by adding new posts and pages. Layout can also be customized and it offers a simple language support.
